byline.contributor: Matt A. V. Chaban contributed reporting.

abstract: Meadowlark Lemon, Harlem Globetrotters star whose halfcourt hook shots and gleeful clowning were high points of traveling basketball show, dies at age 83; gifted athlete's charisma and hardcourt comedy distinguished him as perhaps most famous Globetrotter.
lead_paragraph: Known for his charismatic clowning and his halfcourt hook shots, Lemon was the Globetrotters’ top showman for more than two decades.

headline.main: Meadowlark Lemon Dies at 83; Harlem Globetrotters’ Dazzling Court Jester
headline.print_headline: Meadowlark Lemon, Master of Hardcourt Comedy, Dies

snippet: Known for his charismatic clowning and his halfcourt hook shots, Lemon was the Globetrotters’ top showman for more than two decades.
